org.ngi

Class DragConnectorTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ngi.DragConnectorTool

  • public class DragConnectorTool
extends java.lang.Object
    Drag connector tool for handling click and drag connection operations between nodes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DragConnectorTool(NodeGraph nodeGraph)
      Construct the drag connection tool.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DragConnectorTool

        public DragConnectorTool(NodeGraph nodeGraph)
        Construct the drag connection tool.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public final void reset()
        Reset the tool to it's initial state.

      • setSource

        public boolean setSource(MouseFocus mf)
        Set the source for the drag connector tool. This is the NodeTile that the mouse is pressed on.
        Parameters:
        mf - The MouseFocus object from the mouse press event.
        Returns:
        True if source is valid and accepted, false otherwise.

      • update

        public void update(MouseFocus mf,
                   float x,
                   float y)
        Update the Drag Connector Tool. Called during mouse drag event. Checks to see if mouse focus is viable target This will validate without doing a circular reference check.
        Parameters:
        mf - MouseFOucs object.
        x - Current x value of the mouse.
        y - Current y value of the mouse.

      • makeConnection

        public void makeConnection()
        Make the connection if source and target are available. This will be called on mouseReleased.

      • updateCurve

        public void updateCurve(float x,
                        float y)
        Update the display curve
        Parameters:
        x - Current x value of curve target.
        y - Current y value of curve target.

      • paintConnector

        public void paintConnector(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Paint the Connector Line.
        Parameters:
        g2 - Graphics object to paint to.
